providers.name: David Glenn
providers.title: Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner
background: Board-certified Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner
providers.philosophy: Holistic approach viewing patients as whole persons, not just symptoms. Considers stressors, relationships, lifestyle habits, and spiritual needs. Medication is one tool among many.
patient_testimonials: David is great, he listens to my needs and actually cares about his patients. I've been seeing him for about a year and highly recommend him.

Dave helped me find the right medication regimen when I was on the wrong mix of meds. He was very kind and helpful during the difficult transitional period of changing meds. Finding Dave was a true blessing. He really cares about my health and well-being.

providers.name: Autumn Persinger
providers.title: Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner
providers.philosophy: Patient-centered care where patients control their treatment. Provider educates, guides, and offers medical or holistic options aligned with patient goals.
providers.additional_training: Currently enrolled in functional psychiatry program
patient_testimonials: She provides a very safe, nurturing environment to open up and discuss whatever I felt I needed to… she never once judged me for them, made me feel uncomfortable, or pushed me away.
The absolute BEST!! I adore her. She is extremely positive & encouraging, and really talks through treatment suggestions… She has helped me with my anxiety & depression more than I can even describe!

providers.name: Phillip Jaskot
providers.title: Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner
background: Board-certified Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner
providers.philosophy: Whole-person, collaborative approach. Patients are experts on their lives. Provider listens, guides, and offers therapy techniques, lifestyle adjustments, or medication options.

faq.question: How do I make an appointment?
faq.answer: Fill out our online appointment request form

faq.question: What insurance do you accept?
faq.answer: UHC Community Plan, UHC, Optum VA, Kaiser, UBH, Surest, OSCAR, UMR, Medical Mutual, GEHA, Oxford, All Savers, Golden Rule, Tricare East, Anthem, Cigna, Partners Direct Health, Aetna, and self pay

faq.question: Do you prescribe medications for my condition?
faq.answer: Yes, medications are prescribed based on professional evaluation

faq.question: How long do I have to wait for an appointment?
faq.answer: Contact within 24 hours to schedule. Appointments generally available within 48 hours of online form submission

faq.question: How long does it take to get my prescription once I've had my appointment?
faq.answer: Prescriptions are written during the appointment and are generally available right after, depending on your pharmacy

emergency_resources.note: In case of a psychiatric emergency, call 911 or visit the nearest Emergency Room for immediate assistance
